d1_flags: 1. goto C665E7 if TEMP_4 is set
d1_text:
Npc0036:
[GOTO_IF_FLAG TEMP_4 L_C665E7]
ï¿½Hello sir, how may I help you?[PAUSE 30]  ...Uh...[PAUSE 20]  Aren't you [PRINT_NAME NESS]?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½After our battle I became serious,[PAUSE 15] and have been working very hard.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I've even been doing some training for...[PAUSE 15] for...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Well,[PAUSE 15] a little bit of pro wrasslin'.[PAUSE 20]  It's the ring for me,[PAUSE 15] baby...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
; $C665E7
L_C665E7:
ï¿½So you made it back alive.[PAUSE 20]  You must have many stories to tell.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Let's get together for a drink,[PAUSE 15] when you have a chance so I can hear your stories.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...I'm talking about drinking mineral water.[PAUSE 15]  I'm still under age,[PAUSE 15] you know.[HALT][SET_FLAG TEMP_4]
[END]
